entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
